item.title: OOMA INC 10-K
item.description: OOMA INC, which is in the Services-Computer Processing & Data Preparation [7374] industry, SEC 10-K filing on April 07, 2021 had 31742 (cleaned) words - 600 were utilized for the visualizations. Top Words: may - 388 instances services - 381 instances business - 286 instances ooma - 260 instances financial - 254 instances See the parsed data used in the visualization here. View the actual filing on the SEC website here
